jobs.name: syncIPTVProviderTitles
jobs.description: Fetch metadata from IPTV providers and match TMDB IDs
jobs.schedule: 1 minute after startup and Every 6 hours

jobs.name: providerTitlesMonitor
jobs.description: Monitor provider titles for changes and process main titles (triggered by syncIPTVProviderTitles)

jobs.name: syncLiveTV
jobs.description: Sync Live TV channels and EPG from user-configured M3U and EPG URLs

jobs.name: syncProviderDetails
jobs.description: Sync provider account details (expiration, connections) from authentication endpoints

jobs.name: cleanupUnwantedProviderTitles
jobs.description: Cleanup unwanted provider titles (disabled providers, disabled media types, disabled categories)

jobs.name: syncProviderCategories
jobs.description: Sync provider categories (movies and TV shows) from IPTV providers

jobs.name: updateMetrics
jobs.description: Update all gauge metrics from database (provider titles, main titles, channels, watchlists, users, provider connections)
